meanings.definition: The quality or state of being modern.
meanings.sent1: Her room's modernness impressed the guests.
meanings.sent2: The modernness of the technology amazed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The modernness of his outfit made him stand out at the party.
meanings.sent4: The city's modernness was a stark contrast to the surrounding countryside.
meanings.sent5: The modernness of the building's design was truly innovative.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being up-to-date or current.
meanings.sent1: The modernness of the software made it easy to use.
meanings.sent2: Keeping up with the modernness of fashion trends can be challenging.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to add a touch of modernness to his antique collection was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The modernness of her ideas brought a fresh perspective to the project.
meanings.sent5: The modernness of the news spread quickly through social media.
